requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: DualCore 1.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game supports ONLY monitors with 16:9 aspect ratio. If your monitor is using aspect ratio other than 16:9, there will be black stripes on the edges of the screen.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: QuadCore 2.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game supports ONLY monitors with 16:9 aspect ratio. If your monitor is using aspect ratio other than 16:9, there will be black stripes on the edges of the screen.
